org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.config
Class TestPropertyValueProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.config.PropertyValueProvider
      org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.config.TestPropertyValueProvider

public final class TestPropertyValueProvider
extends PropertyValueProvider

A PropertyValueProvider that allows runtime modification of property values to support unit testing code. By using this class a unit test can exercise a piece of code with a number of different property values without needing to change property values in their underlaying source.

This class maintains an in-memory collection of property values supplied by calling the setProperty method. When a value is requested by the ConfigPropertyService the in-memory collection of values are consulted first. If a value has been supplied that will be returned, otherwise the property value will be fetched from the configured property value provider.

When this class is used it will coordinate with the ConfigPropertyService to ensure values are obained from this class.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static TestPropertyValueProvider getInstance(javax.faces.context.ExternalContext externalContext)
Obtain a reference to the test value provider. Calling this method will also result in the test property value provider being installed with the ConfigPropertyService.
Returns:
a test value provider.

getValue

public java.lang.String getValue(javax.faces.context.ExternalContext extCtx,
                                 java.lang.String name)
Used by the ConfigPropertyService to obtain a property value. If a value has been specified by calling the setProperty method that value will be returned, otherwise the request will be delegated to the configured property value provider.
Specified by:
getValue in class PropertyValueProvider
Parameters:
extCtx - container context object.
name - name of the requested property.
Returns:
the value of the property or null if the property was not found.

setProperty

public void setProperty(javax.faces.context.ExternalContext externalContext,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String value)
Set the value of a property. Calling this method only updates the in-memory value used for test purposes. The value is not propagated to any underlying storage.

Any PropertyChangeListener reqiested with the ConfigPropertyService will be notified of the value change when this method is called.

Parameters:
externalContext - container context object.
name - name of the property.
value - value of the property.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the property name is null.

removeProperty

public void removeProperty(javax.faces.context.ExternalContext externalContext,
                           java.lang.String name)
Remove a property value from the test value provider.
Parameters:
name - name of the property.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the property name is null.

resetValues

public void resetValues()
Removes all in-memory property values specified by calling setProperty, returning them to their original values.
